meanings.sent1: The paper was so tearable that it ripped easily.
meanings.sent2: Be careful with that tearable fabric; it can easily tear.
meanings.sent3: I tried to tear the tearable paper neatly, but it ended up in pieces!
meanings.sent4: The fragile relationship between them was as tearable as a piece of tissue paper.
meanings.sent5: The old book's pages were so tearable that they crumbled at the slightest touch.

meanings.definition: Able to be ripped or shredded.
meanings.sent1: The tearable cloth tore easily when pulled.
meanings.sent2: She avoided wearing the tearable dress to prevent any accidental tears.
meanings.sent3: The tearable document got caught in the wind and shredded into bits.
meanings.sent4: The tearable packaging was no match for the sharp claws of the cat.
meanings.sent5: The tearable plastic bag split open as soon as it was filled with heavy items.
